112.content: What does he turn into?
112.title: TG

1121.content:
Does he just turn into the opposite sex or are there additional changes?

If it is just a TG than everything than everything stays very close to Ash aside from his gender.
He would essentially turn into an extreme tomboy (pants, short hair, etc.).

If there are additional changes Ash could for example turn girlier, which would mean he would turn into a girl he could have been if he was born that way (this could mean longer hair, or skirts/dresses, or a liking for the colour pink, but could also express itself differently).
1121.title: Female version of himself

112121.content:
It was a beautiful day in the pokemon-world. The sun was shining, Pidgeys where singing in the sky and Ash Ketchum aspiring pokemon-master and his constant companion Pikachu where... hopelessly lost.
In an effort to catch-up to their other companions, that had traveled ahead, the two had left the normal route to take a shortcut right through the forrest. It had been going great and at the pace they traveled, they might even reach the next city first. The two where in high spirits, until a cry from above shook them.
They had walked straight into a Spearow nesting-ground. Five minutes later, after a lot of running, pecking and getting sand in their eyes, the two found themself in their current predicament.

"Stupid Spearows just attacking us! Stupid forrest that just won't end! And stupid friends just laving us behind, because I needed more than one try to earn a badge!", Ash cried out in frustration, kicking a tree-stump to vent his frustration.
"Pika Pi."
"Yes Pikachu, I know it's our own fault", he replied, "It just that... hey what is that?"

The rotten remains of the tree he kicked had broken apart revealing a strange stone. It was an opaque, oval jewel with, roughly the same size as a pokeball, but the strangest thing about it was the fac,t that there seemed to be a faint light emanating from deep inside it. It looked alluring, almost as if it wanted to be touched, to be held. Ash slowly extended his arm...

"Pika!"
"What? I just thought it looked cool!"
"Pii..."
"Well, maybe it valuable. Uhhh! Maybe it can be used to attract a rare pokemon!"
"Pikachu!"
"You don't have to touch it then. God sometimes you act just like mom.", with that Ash shrugged, bend down and picked up the stone.

He felt a tingle, as if his palm at fallen asleep. Then the stone started vibrating, the light shining from it intensified. He had seen something similar before.It looked almost like a miniature Voltorb about to self destruct! Ash instantly dropped the stone and threw himself over Pikachu in an effort to shield the electric-type.
There was no sound, even the ever-present noises of forrest seemed to vanish, as a wave of pure white light washed over the trainer and his pokemon.

How fast does the transformation occure?
112121.title: A strange rock

112122.content: How about a Pokemon slowly drains him of his masculinity and turn him into a girly girl ?
112122.title: Other

1121221.content:
Ash was wondering the woods around Celadon city, he was alone. He left all of his Pokemon back Pokecenter. He feel like he needed them, as his plan was just to out for hour or two. Surprisingly he noticed there wheren't any Pokemon around, he was disappointed. He wanted to see some and maybe make another friend.

Ash continued walking around for another few minutes. Then he spotted something strange, it was a Drowzee, but this was different. Instead of the normal brown and yellow, this one was Pink and purple. Cool, he thought as he slowly approached this unique Pokemon.

" Hello there." Said Ash, in a friendly tone.

Drowzee turned and looked at this human boy, he looked him over and smiled at Ash. He thought this means they could be friends. What Ash didn't know was this Drowzee was unique in more then just color. Normal Drowzee feeds on dreams, but this one feeds on the masculinity of male trainers. Slowly turning them into girly girls, he took one look at Ash and decided that this trainer would be his next meal/victim. Drowzee loves very masculine males, they taste better and he enjoyed when they realize what was happening to them.

Taking one look at Ash and he knew this was going to be funny and delicious.

Drowzee went up to Ash and...

Option 1: Hypnotize him, giving him dreams about being a submissive girl.

Option 2: Hugged him, taking a small part of Ash's masculinity.
1121221.title: yes

choices: Just a year younger. 9 year olds can't adventure for Pokemon yet.
He's now a 4 year old toddler. Still in potty training.
He's only a diapered 2 year old.

But why does this age regression happen?

1141221.content: *one day in the Sinnoh region Ash was talking to May and Brock when suddenly he got thirsty. Ash told Dawn, Brock and Pikachu to wait here as he gets up and goes to a nearby water fountain to drink water. When suddenly he felt different he knelled down to the floor and he felt something tight around his area as he goes down to inspect "it". He blushed as blue fire begins to surround him as "she" transforms into a Female Lucario. "what the heak" she says covering her mouth and gulps. *she gets up wakefully not knowing what to do*

114311.content: Was he alone when he found this "object?"
114311.title: Object

114312.content: Was it a Lucario that wanted a daughter?
114312.title: More

1143121.content:
Laura is a Female Lucario that hated all men, she thought they where all slobs. She once had friends that thought the same way, but they had all given into their primal desires and had given them self's to the males that they once despised. But as the days went on, Laura found herself wanting a child of her own, but she wasn't about to give birth to a boy, witch where the more common out of her species, nor would she hand her body over to a male. She had a plan to make sure that her child was both a girl and she didn't have to get a male.
Laura was sitting by one of the routes that Humans frequently used. She was waiting for a Human with a strong and malleable aura that she could turn into her daughter. She had been waiting for 5 days now and not a single human that had passed had a strong enough Aura. As the sun was about to go down the Human she was looking for passed by. It has a Human boy with black spiky hair and a Pikachu sitting on his shoulder.
At first Laura was disgusted that the Human she was looking for turned out to be male, but that lasted only for a bit since his aura was incredibly malleable, She could make him whatever she wanted. All she had to do was lay in wait.
1143121.title: Lonely Lucario

11431212.content: Laura stayed hidden and started mapping out her strategy... (I could fire now and get this done quickly...) She said to herself, (but I should probably follow him to the nearest settlement, and decide to confront him or not, from there.)
11431212.title: Something else?

choices: Changed the boy into her daughter.
Waited in order to make sure the boy was asleep.
114312122.content:
Laura decided to follow the human boy, Being hasty could ruin her chance to turn this boy into her daughter.
Keeping herself hidden, Laura followed the boy along the route. After awhile of following the Boy stopped and Looked at the sun position in the sky and said something to his Pikachu who responded with a nod. The boy stepped off the route and found a small clearing and set up a small campsite. After awhile the Boy and his Pikachu fell Asleep. Laura then...
114312122.title: (At ease, Laura.)
